description: Applies the configuration settings from the target slot onto the current slot.

preservevnet.description: true to preserve Virtual Network to the slot during swap; otherwise, false.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

slot_swap_entity.description: JSON object that contains the target slot name. See example.

slot.description: Name of the source slot. If a slot is not specified, the production slot is used as the source slot.

subscription_id.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

targetslot.description: Destination deployment slot during swap operation.
